title: Episode 300: Killing Mr. Perfect (DeVon Franklin)
itunes:title: Episode 300: Killing Mr. Perfect (DeVon Franklin)
description:
Producer/Author, DeVon Franklin joins the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote his upcoming book "Live Free." DeVon and the ladies discuss a range of topics including setting sexual expectations for you and your partner, working on yourself to make your relationship thrive, dealing with partners who manipulate you, and much more. DeVon even gives his two cents regarding the whole Derrick Jaxn situation. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
